p: The crystallites could be associated with aggregates uniformly embedded in the amorphous macromolecular domains and are visible in the cross-polarization optical micrographs of the hydrogels ( Figure 8 and Figure 9). In the case of ι-carrageenan, these associations have an average diameter of 7 μm and seem to be in a lower amount than in PVA, according to its low crystallinity value.
